title: FS: pair of prewar baseball RPPCs $SOLD PPD...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: FS: pair of prewar baseball RPPCs $SOLD PPD...
posts.post_content:
For sale is a pair of RPPCs of what appears to be amateur players.  Nice clarity given their age.  Incidentally, runscott has another on ebay which depicts the same subjects.

$SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S.

Please email me if interested.  Commitment to purchase surpasses any ongoing negotiations.  :eek: :rolleyes:
